text: Litaŵani ntima wenu (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) pakuŵa pamo ni aŵala ŵaakum’bombanga M’mbuje gwao kundaŵi ni kwigulo achisachililaga ngope Jakwe, soni meso genu gakaapeleta ŵanganyao (ni kwalola ŵane) nchisachililaga ipeto yaumi wa duniya, soni ngasimunkunda ajula jwatuuliŵesye ntima wakwe yaatukumbuchila Uwwe, ni jukuyiye isako yakwe, soni ichindu yakwe iŵele yakwasika
